meanings.definition: The process of maintaining or preserving something.
meanings.sent1: Regular maintenances of the garden help it stay beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The maintenances of the historic building are crucial for its preservation.
meanings.sent3: The strict maintenances of his toy collection made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her daily maintenances of her health were like a shield against illness.
meanings.sent5: The maintenances of the old clock were meticulous and loving.

meanings.definition: Financial support or resources provided for the upkeep of something.
meanings.sent1: The company's generous maintenances ensured the success of the project.
meanings.sent2: She relied on the maintenances from her family to pay for her education.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected maintenances from the government saved the struggling business.
meanings.sent4: His unexpected bonus was a much-needed maintenance for his savings.
meanings.sent5: The maintenances from the charity were a lifeline for the shelter.

meanings.definition: The act of keeping something in good condition.
meanings.sent1: Regular maintenances of the car prevent breakdowns.
meanings.sent2: The maintenances of the house include cleaning and repairs.
meanings.sent3: His creative maintenances of his bike made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the maintenances of her relationships strengthened her bonds.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous maintenances of the antique vase kept it looking new.
